Method Detail

onCreate

onClick

public void onClick(View view)
on clicking the button, set the value of string btn_pressed to the button name which has been pressed. Then Retrieve the values of the edit text boxes and store them in the variables. Store the value of each series in the respective array of integers Then pass the values of the arrays and btn_pressed to the next activity which will display the charts
